page.title: 04FARMING IN SOUTH INVERKIP
page.content: There are three farms in this area. Finnock Bog and Hill farm are both dairy farms. They have 350 livestock and 160 hectares between them. Berfern farm is a beef farm with 52 livestock and 30 hectares of land. Both Berfern farm and Finnock Bog farm have been made smaller due to the electricity board having built a power station. On the other hand the Hill farm has expanded. All of the farms are tenants of the{Ardgowan Estate. All the farms are family businesses and all of them provide employment, but only for one or two people. The attitudes of all three farmers is that they enjoy both the climate and the farming in the area.
